abstract: Global miner Rio Tinto says its $19.5 billion tie-up with China’s state-owned Chinalco is an “evolving” deal and still subject to shareholder consultation.
snippet: Global miner Rio Tinto says its $19.5 billion tie-up with China’s state-owned Chinalco is an “evolving” deal and still subject to shareholder consultation.
lead_paragraph: Global miner Rio Tinto says its $19.5 billion tie-up with China’s state-owned Chinalco is an evolving deal and still subject to shareholder consultation, Reuters reports.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Says Chinalco Deal Is Still Evolving
